mods.abstract: A feluka upon the Nile, both sails outstretched in opposite directions (foreground); another vessel closer to rocky cliffs (background); "Edition Photoglob 5632 Ge..." (illegible title due to paper loss) in white along bottom of print. (Number on object is 27/655).

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt
